Title: Less births, better births, to develop China vigorously
Publisher: Beijing Centre of Communication and Education for Family Planning (北京计划生育宣传教育中心 - Beijing jihua shengyu xuanchuan jiaoyu zhongxin)
Notes: In the 1980s, the One Child Policy is enforced, with more success in the cities than in the countryside. On posters like this, it is usually girls that are shown, to indicate that they are worth as much as boys.
